#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int N,Nc,K,a,op=1;
	cin>>N>>K;
	Nc=N--;
	cin>>a;
	while(N--)
	{
	    int b;
	    cin>>b;
	    if(abs(a-b)<=K)
	        op++;
	    else
	    {
	        cout<<op<<endl;
	        return 0;
	    }
	    a=b;
	}
	cout<<Nc<<endl;
	return 0;
}
